attributes.title: Horrible, disgusting, no good

attributes.review: This app made me blind! I downloaded it to see the marvelous FACTS our young, beautifully tan king is saying but somehow after seeing the things in the app I became blind!

attributes.title: 🧚🏻‍♂️✨bad app✨🧚🏻‍♂️
attributes.review: this is a terribly designed and terribly organized app. i was very disappointed to see this because of course, trump 2020✨🧚🏻‍♂️. but as soon as i started going through the app i realized it was stealing all my data😠i do not recommend this app to anyone

attributes.title: Ban trump
attributes.review: Litterally worst guy ever don’t get this app he will know your number also he is trying to ban tik tok what kind of guy is this

attributes.title: this app actually gave me hives
attributes.review: so i was gonna go open this app and then initially delete it but when i opened i broke out into hives. i think that it happened because if the complete stupidity of its contexts but i’m not sure. can i get a refund?

attributes.title: scary experience
attributes.review: the weirdest thing happened!! when i opened the app satan arrived at my house and he brought his henchmen of hell with him. oddly enough his henchmen were shane yaw and gabbie hanna!!! shane tried to steal my cat. he said it was for “personal reasons” and gabbie started rapping would not recommend!! terrible app.
